{% extends "templates/item_page.html" %} {% set namespaces = "cmoon" %} {% set library_name = "Type Traits" %} {% set item_name = "is_specialization" %} {% block nested %}../{% endblock %} {% block content2 %} {{macros.defined("cmoon.type_traits", github_url_src + "/type_traits/type_traits.ixx")}} {{macros.overload_set([ " template class Template> struct is_specialization; " ])}}

If the complete type Type is a template specialization of the incomplete type Template, its member constant value is true. Otherwise, its member constant value is false.

For example, std::string is a specialization of std::basic_string.

{{macros.helper_variable_template( " template class Template> inline constexpr bool is_specialization_v = is_specialization::value; " )}} {% endblock %}
